about_the_game: "True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3" is the final chapter of the acclaimed psychological thriller trilogy. Featuring point-and-click mechanics, challenging puzzles, cinematic cutscenes and a uniquely dark atmosphere, the final installment answers all the questions and brings the journey to the epic conclusion. Prepare to immerse yourself in a richly crafted horror experience that pushes the boundaries of the genre and face the demon that haunts the Stonehouse family.
